answers.answer: I am in the same boat im due february 23 and have thought about this n also my daughter will b 4 december 28th and i always have her partu in january so o really dont know i was thinking have my shower in november but that's Thanksgiving and is that to early? Maybe early November

I'm due November 28th which is thanksgiving . I'm doing mine when I'm 35 weeks. I feel doing it when you are just at full term (37 weeks) is cutting it too close. In the last few weeks you should just be relaxing and prepping for baby .

Im due feb 4 th so im having mine in november due to the fact my son was 6 weeks early and they are saying i probably wont go full turm with this one either i want to have everything ready for this baby before christmas

Im due feb 4 th so im having mine in november due to the fact my son was 6 weeks early and they are saying i probably wont go full turm with this one either i want to have everything ready for this baby before christmas
I think November is kind of early for a late February baby. I would do it like 2nd week of January . But it's really all up to you .
Im due February 3rd and since theres alot of bdays in my family in November December and January Im just gonna have mine the end of October beginning of November
I'm due feb 17 and doing mine in november
Yes i have my daughters party in january so i dont want to do it then or maybe i can habe it February 2nd on my birthday how would that b? I will b super huge then though!
What does it matter if its "too early" go and get the good gifts lol. I wanna do mine november so we have time to get anything we need that we haven't already bought or won't get at the babyshower

Im due march 21. Im having mine in jan. I think u can do it in december. Doesnt matter about christmas. People are going to have money to shop for gifts anyway, but let them know early so they can put extra money aside if u do it in december and I dont think november is too early. It will give you enough time to save up extra money to get all of the things you need instead of havin it so close to ur due date and getting yourself frustrated trying to get all those things in a short amount of time....especially if money is tight.

Thanks ladies:) @kristiann2011 I think the last weekend in November would be perfect for both of us lol. Away from Christmas and away from our due date, like the other ladies said, it gives you time to buy the stuff you dont get at your shower and leaves enough time to relax and not stress about it...  I mean last weekend in November would make me 28 weeks exactly .. which is on Nov 30.. or do it Dec 7 which would be 29 weeks.. :)
Im due 11th of February and im doin mine the end of october as the end of november will be money b4 xmas and december is xmas month and jan too late incase I go early xx
Lol sounds perfect. I have most of the big stuff. Just need a play pin a basinet maybe a travel swing. Maybe a changing table lol.
I'm due January 6th. I'm having mine the last weekend in October to avoid all the holidays in general. I know it's early but it's to avoid everyone's already made thanksgiving and Christmas plans.

Same here I'm due February 25 with my third and both other kids birthdays are in December so money is going to be tight for me around that time but I didn't have a baby shower with either of my other kids I wanted to do one this time but I have a feeling I'll just end up not even having one again I'll maybe just do it in November

question: Okay so I'm due Feb 22 and I need to figure out when I should have my baby shower... Should I do it the beginning of December or the beginning of January.. I ask because that's a money crunch month and call me selfish all you want but I want my baby to get nice gifts lol .. my bf said to do it before Christmas so everyone still has money to spend, but my sister said to wait till after Christmas because everyone is going to forget about my shower trying to prepare for Christmas..but after Christmas everyone is going to be broke lol and I can't have it late in jan because I have a history of preeclampsia and with my luck I will end up going in for a c-section earlier then planned then I'm stuck with having no shower .. so can someone give me some of there input thank you :)
title: need your help ladies ...
